entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't create duplicate output window categories #67429
  • [MAUI] Roslyn source generator is not run during .NET Hot Reload, triggers rude edit when x:Name is changed #67428
  • Investigate ways to potentially speed up ForAttributeWithMetadataName #67426
  • Test plan for "interceptors" #67421
  • Code fixes: `Folders` property is always empty for `Project.AdditionalDocuments` (C# analyzer additional files) #67414
  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #67413
  • Add a C# code defragmenter? #67412
  • Update the class template to add the sealed modifier by default #67411
  • Crash when applying code fix to aspx file that is open in Visual Studio #67410
  • Add Explicit Return Type in C# #67409
  • Highlight references under cursor only if fully selected #67408
  • Display only methods of a particular scope #67407
  • please show typeinfo in document outline window when i open a c#file #67406
  • .NET app - Copy string unformatted / plain when debugging #67405
  • Formatting toolbar should work in code window #67404
  • Suggestions for setting 'var' preferences code style in C# editor #67403
  • Make code snippets use up-to-date syntax where applicable. #67402
  • Visual Basic Documentation Comments should minimize beside target, not above it. #67401
  • Formatting option to insert newline after file scoped namespace declarations #67400
  • Integrate `dotnet format` in Visual Studio #67399
  • Code Snippet for 'Debug.WriteLine()' in C# #67398
  • Inheritance margin should show language glyph for ambigous members as well #67397
  • Display inline parameter name hints bug #67395
  • Text Editor Format Selection disturbs non-selected line #67394
  • LSIF generator should be self-contained/self-bootstrapping #67389

Closed

  • Need to add support for `using unsafe static <Type>;` #67329
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add archived feeds #67430
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove abstract method that always returns the same value #67427
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use VS specific completion kinds in core LSP protocol layer #67419
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2140648 #67418
  • Enum base list completions #67396
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Add warning wave doc for 'taking address of local or parameter in async method' #67420
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update feature status #67422
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Remove assert in CheckParameterValEscape() #67424
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Create a new solution folder for all things language-server related #67423
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Display exception filters by `BoundNode.DumpSource()` #67393
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify diagnostic check #67390
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 17.5 CI build #67381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test #67387
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused state form TypeofBinder and GetTypeBinder. #67343
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers, Pending director approval, servicing-approved, 17.5
  • Port 66085 to 17.5 for servicing #67300
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, servicing-approved
  • Reduce allocations in diagnostic analyzer management system. #67376
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch and resolve conflicts around primary constructors #67362
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid applying partial changes when a code fix contains a mix of supported and unsupported actions #67262
    Area-IDE
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
